game.name: OKUGAFUCHI Shopping Street
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A timid real estate agent is sent to the abandoned Okugafuchi Shopping District to perform a mysterious ritual for redevelopment. But a wandering female ghost and the town’s cursed past stand in the way. As he uncovers old documents and legends, a buried truth begins to surface.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A timid real estate agent is sent to the abandoned Okugafuchi Shopping District to perform a mysterious ritual for redevelopment. But a wandering female ghost and the town’s cursed past stand in the way. As he uncovers old documents and legends, a buried truth begins to surface.
